Off to Chemistry. *sigh*

::Firearm::

Firearm finds the chip, about to remove it when he hesitates. What if 
it had tied into her systems so much that removal would be fatal?

Turning in his chair, Firearm taps a few buttons, starting a scan of 
Spears and the chip.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> The trainer chip is located on her neck just under her jaw line
